definitions.title: n.m. et. f.
definitions.body: a nine, nonad (NH = BH; As. tišit (fem.), nine, tešû, ninth; Sab. [[תסעת]] nine, [[תסעי]] ninety Hom:Chr 48; Lihy. [[תסע]] DHM:Ep. Denkm. Ar. 52, Ar. tis9un, Eth. ts9u: Aram. [[תְּשַׁע]] t4a9, Nab. Palm. [[תשע]] Lzb:388, Mand. ([[א]] for [[ע]]; sts. [[ע]] pref.) [[תשא]], [[עשתא]] Nö:M 188, all nine);—

definitions.title: m.c.n.f.
definitions.body: abs. [[תֵּ֫שַׁע]] De 3:11 + 20 t., cstr. [[תְּשַׁע]] Ju Jdg 4:3 + 18 t.; f. c.

definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: abs. [[תִּשְׁעָה]] 2Sa 14:8 + 13 t., cstr. [[תִּשְׁעַת]] Jos 13:7 + 2 t. (these include 9 + 10 = 19);—nine (Hex chiefly P);

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: = ordin. [[לַחׂדֶשׁ]] 2Ki 25:3 + 3 t. on the ninth (day) of the month; [[שְׁנַת־תֵּשַׁע לְ]] 2Ki 18:10 the ninth year of.

definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: [[תְּשַׁע־עֶשְׂרֵה שָׁנׇה]] Ge 11:25, [[עָרִים תְּשַׁע־]] [[עֶשְׂרֵה]]Jos 19:38 (both P), as ordinal [[שְׁנַת תְּשַׁע־]] [[עֶשְׂרִים שָׁנׇה לְ]] 2Ki 25:8 ‖ Je 52:12; c.
